statements: SELECT species_name, genetic_sequence, mutation_rate, evolutionary_distance FROM phylogenetic_analysis;
SELECT species_name, evolutionary_distance, genetic_sequence, mutation_rate FROM phylogenetic_analysis;
SELECT genetic_sequence, mutation_rate, species_name, evolutionary_distance FROM phylogenetic_analysis;
SELECT * FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE mutation_rate > 0.05;
SELECT species_name, genetic_sequence FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE evolutionary_distance < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE mutation_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT species_name, genetic_sequence FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE evolutionary_distance < 0.05 ORDER BY evolutionary_distance DESC
SELECT species_name, mutation_rate FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE genetic_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%'
SELECT genetic_sequence FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE evolutionary_distance BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.1 ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM phylogenetic_analysis
SELECT * FROM phylogenetic_analysis;
SELECT species_name, sequence_data FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM phylogenetic_analysis;
SELECT species_name, phylogenetic_tree FROM phylogenetic_analysis ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species1_name, species2_name, relationship_type FROM evolutionary_relationships WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT id, species_name, sequence_data, phylogenetic_tree FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT species_name, sequence_data FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%GCTG%';
SELECT species_name, sequence_data FROM phylogenetic_analysis ORDER BY species_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species1_name, species2_name, relationship_type, similarity_score FROM evolutionary_relationships WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT id, species_name, sequence_data FROM phylogenetic_analysis WHERE species_name = 'Homo sapiens' OR species_name = 'Pan troglodytes';
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT genus_name FROM Genus ORDER BY genus_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM Species JOIN Genus ON Species.species_id = Genus.genus_id;
SELECT * FROM Phylogeny WHERE evolutionary_distance > 0.5 ORDER BY phylogeny_id;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Reptile';
SELECT species_name, genus_name FROM Species JOIN Genus ON Species.species_id = Genus.genus_id;
SELECT * FROM Phylogeny WHERE evolutionary_distance > 0.5 ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, genus_name, evolutionary_distance FROM Species JOIN Genus ON Species.species_id = Genus.genus_id JOIN Phylogeny ON Species.species_id = Phylogeny.species_id;
SELECT * FROM PhylogeneticTree;
SELECT tree_id, species_id, tree_description FROM PhylogeneticTree;
SELECT data_id, genetic_sequence FROM GeneticData ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT tree_id, distance_value FROM EvolutionaryDistance WHERE distance_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT tree_description FROM PhylogeneticTree WHERE species_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData INNER JOIN PhylogeneticTree ON GeneticData.tree_id = PhylogeneticTree.tree_id;

SELECT species_name, distance_value FROM Species JOIN PhylogeneticTree ON Species.species_id = PhylogeneticTree.species_id JOIN EvolutionaryDistance ON PhylogeneticTree.tree_id = EvolutionaryDistance.tree_id WHERE EvolutionaryDistance.distance_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT genus_name, founding_year FROM Genus ORDER BY founding_year DESC;
SELECT family_name, number_of_species FROM Family WHERE number_of_species > 100 ORDER BY number_of_species DESC;
SELECT order_name, location_id FROM Order WHERE location_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT genus_name, founding_year FROM Genus WHERE founding_year > 2000 ORDER BY genus_name DESC;
SELECT family_name, number_of_species FROM Family WHERE number_of_species < 100 ORDER BY number_of_species ASC;
SELECT order_name FROM Order JOIN Phylogeny ON Order.order_id = Phylogeny.order_id WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Species JOIN Genus ON Species.species_id = Genus.genus_id WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
